content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseDelimitedTextFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
			))
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'hpi_ag83stdev00006_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [hpi_ag83stdev00006_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://hpi@ag83stdev00006.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE patientInfo (
	[Patient Name] nvarchar(4000),
	[Gender] nvarchar(4000),
	[Phone] nvarchar(4000),
	[Mail] nvarchar(4000),
	[Medical Insurance Card] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'PatientInformation/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [hpi_ag83stdev00006_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT * FROM patientInfo
